original_text: Yes, you will have trouble like this for a short time. But after that, God will make everything right. He is completely kind and he will always help you. Because you belong to Christ, God has chosen you to live with him in heaven for ever. You will join him in that beautiful place. Then God will make you well again. He will make you strong in your spirits. You will be able to stand strongly.
korean_text: 모든 은혜의 하나님 곧 그리스도 안에서 너희를 부르사 자기의 영원한 영광에 들어가게 하신 이가 잠깐 고난을 당한 너희를 친히 온전하게 하시며 굳건하게 하시며 강하게 하시며 터를 견고하게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: Yes, you will have trouble like this

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 모든 것을 바로잡아 주실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and he will always help you.
to live with him in heaven for ever.
sentences.korean_translation: 영원히 하늘에서 그분과 함께 살기 위해

sentences.original_text: Then God will make you well again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님이 다시 여러분을 낫게 하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will make you strong in your spirits.
You will be able to stand strongly.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분은 힘차게 설 수 있을 것이다.
